Methods

EulerDegreesToQuaternion(float, float, float)

Creates a Quaternion from Euler angles specified in degrees.

public static Quaternion EulerDegreesToQuaternion(float pitch, float yaw, float roll)

Parameters

pitch float

The pitch angle in degrees (rotation around the X axis).

yaw float

The yaw angle in degrees (rotation around the Y axis).

roll float

The roll angle in degrees (rotation around the Z axis).

Returns

Quaternion

A Quaternion representing the combined rotation.

EulerDegreesToQuaternion(float, float, float, float)

Creates a delta Quaternion rotation from Euler angles in degrees, scaled by a time step.

public static Quaternion EulerDegreesToQuaternion(float pitch, float yaw, float roll, float deltaTime)

Parameters

pitch float

The pitch angle in degrees (rotation around the X axis).

yaw float

The yaw angle in degrees (rotation around the Y axis).

roll float

The roll angle in degrees (rotation around the Z axis).

deltaTime float

The elapsed time step to scale the rotation by.

Returns

Quaternion

A Quaternion representing the incremental rotation.

Vector3Angle(Vector3, Vector3)

Calculates the angle in radians between two vectors.

public static float Vector3Angle(Vector3 v1, Vector3 v2)

Parameters

v1 Vector3

The first vector.

v2 Vector3

The second vector.

Returns

float

The angle in radians between the two vectors.

Vector3RotateByAxisAngle(Vector3, Vector3, float)

Rotates a vector around a specified axis by a given angle.

public static Vector3 Vector3RotateByAxisAngle(Vector3 v, Vector3 axis, float angle)

Parameters

v Vector3

The vector to be rotated.

axis Vector3

The axis around which to rotate the vector.

angle float

The angle in radians by which to rotate the vector.

Returns

Vector3

The rotated vector.
